Name: anl_base_thresh
Description: minimum number of modified tuples before analyze

Name: anl_scale_factor
Description: multiplier for reltuples to add to anl_base_thresh

Name: enabled
Description: if false, this table is never autovacuumed

Name: vac_base_thresh
Description: minimum number of modified tuples before vacuum

Name: vac_scale_factor
Description: multiplier for reltuples to add to vac_base_thresh

Name: vacrelid
Description: the table this entry is for
